description: Awesome chat alternative to something like Discord. Completely open-source and privacy-forward.
Finally a proper Discord alternative, it still needs some work but very promising

Well made and feels great to use, and provides features from Discord nitro such as profile banners, but completely free without the need for any subscriptions, only big downside is not many people use it, leading to servers feeling very dead.

Great community, good support and I can make my own Revolt Clients without worring that my account is going to be banned.

Also free nitro features go brrr
only needs more users, but the devs cant do nothing about it.
Very good privacy-respecting Discord alternative, but please fix system tray icon for Flatpak.

The ideas/what this project claims to stand for over a year are still unimplemented. Pros mostly open source, looks and feels for the most part like discord. Cons lack of active user base, no encryption (like advertised), data stored with revolt (you can host your own server but making it discoverable is not easy) and lack of native iOS/Android apps.

I would recommend anyone trying to find a discord replacement this may be your only and not very good alternative. Its pretty cool with some features but by far, this is not a full release of something I would say is finished!
реально нормас, опенсрусный дискорд! весь код открыт, а само приложение стало оч стабильным!
